Package com.dacm.hexagonal.application.service

Class UserServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.dacm.hexagonal.application.service.UserServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserService
@Service public class UserServiceImpl extends Object implements UserService
Implementation of the user service that manages business logic related to users. This class implements the UserService interface, providing concrete functionalities for saving, updating, finding, and deleting users, as well as listing all users with the ability to apply filters and pagination.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • saveMultipleUsers

      public AddedResponse saveMultipleUsers(User[] users)
      Saves multiple user entities to the database while checking for duplicates in usernames and emails. This method iterates over an array of UserEntity objects, checks for existing usernames and emails, and processes each user accordingly. If the userId or email already exists, the user is not added, and an error report is generated. Successful additions are tracked and returned in the response.
      Specified by:
      saveMultipleUsers in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      users - An array of UserEntity objects to be saved.
      Returns:
      An AddedResponse object that includes details about the success of the operation, the total number of users attempted to be added, the number of successful additions, the number of failures, lists of successfully added users and failed users, and a reason for any failures.

    • updateUser

      public ApiResponse updateUser(String userId, User user)
      Updates a user by userId and returns the result as an API response.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      userId - The userId of the user to update.
      user - New user data for the update.
      Returns:
      ApiResponse indicating success or failure of the update.

    • findAllUsers

      public org.springframework.data.domain.Page<UserPaginationResponse> findAllUsers(String userId, String lastName, String firstName, String email, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Finds all users based on filters and pagination parameters and returns the results paginated.
      Specified by:
      findAllUsers in interface UserService
      Parameters:
      userId - Optional filter by userId.
      lastName - Optional filter by last name.
      firstName - Optional filter by first name.
      email - Optional filter by email.
      pageable - Pagination parameters.
      Returns:
      A page of UserDto objects corresponding to the filtered and paginated results.
